recordData.description: 3 Idiots is a 2009 Indian Tamil-language coming-of-age comedy-drama film written, edited and directed by Rajkumar Hirani and co-written by Abhijat Joshi
Chak De! India ( transl. Let's Go! India) is a 2007 Indian Hindi-language sports film directed by Shimit Amin and produced by Aditya Chopra,
